short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Eat all the dots in the maze while avoiding the ghosts!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy playing the classic maze action game offline on your Google Chrome browser! Simply install the extension and click the game icon in the Chrome extension toolbar to start.

Your goal is to guide the character to eat all the dots in the maze while avoiding four multi-colored ghosts. These ghosts will chase the character throughout the maze. If a ghost catches the character, a life is lost. The game ends when all lives are depleted. Have fun!

CHANGELOG
==========
Version 0.1.2 - 0.1.3
- Rename the game
- Update map and animations

Version 0.1.0 - 0.1.1
- Initial release of the game
- Update some features
